summary: The Sistine Chapel is a famous room in the Vatican, where the Pope lives. It's named after Pope Sixtus IV, who had it built in the late 1400s. Many famous artists, like Botticelli and Perugino, painted beautiful pictures (frescoes) on the walls. Later, Michelangelo painted the ceiling, which is one of the most famous art projects in history. He also painted a huge picture called "The Last Judgment" on one of the walls. People come from all over the world to see these amazing paintings.
title: Sistine Chapel
